_sText:
Disco Mod
di_john_scatman
This Mod is made just to have a rest. Main Idea is to dance by music in Disco Room. But if you are bored you could go to Bunny Hop or Knife Arena. By passing BH you could receive grenade which will increase your movement speed. There are also 4 grenade-lasers (2 in toilet, 1 in garage, 1 in owners' office).
Disco PlayList:
John Scatman - Scatman John Scatman - Scatmans' World
Map Features
- Cubemaps - Optimised Map (Nodraw, Hint\Skip, func_detail) - Good Design (Nice Textures and Props). Such Design Element like - Barmen, Guards, Dancers
Current Map Version is 0.2.1
You could play this map on |KTM|Disco Mod Server
109.196.178.10:27015
FixLog you could find in DevNotes Coming up in 0.3: - Color correction - Outdoor area
